page.title: 06Education
page.content: The Headmaster of Fairchildes Junior School is Mr.Baxter,the Deputy Head is Mrs.Gillham.The other are called Mrs.Bone,Mrs.Cawley,Mrs.Rowling,Miss. Slinn,Mrs.Hardyment,Mr.Rimmer,Mrs. Campbell,and Mr.Hunt.Mrs.Shilton is our secretary.There are about 180 children in the school.Each teacher has a subject they like teaching. Mrs.Campbell-games. Mrs.Bone-reading. Mrs.Cawley-mathematics. Mrs.Hardyment-Audio Visual Aids. Mr.Rimmer-Science. Mrs.Rowling-music. On our school field we have three football pitches one cricket pitch and two rounders pitches and two netball courts.We have only one hall,we use it for assembly,P.E,Gym club,Drama and dance club.There is a music room,a library an art room and also a games cupboard.There are two classes for each year and there are four years.
